title: $4000-3/2.5 North Miami/Aventura Isles Lakefront House-Garage-Pool
neighborhood: North Miami-Aventura/Ives Dairy Rd-Just West of I95
posting_body: ['Single family home in an elegant and family friendly gated community.', 'This wonderful house features 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms, high ceilings and an open kitchen.', 'This unit includes granite counter tops, ceramic and hardwood flooring and stainless steel appliances.', 'Property sits on a privileged lot with a fenced backyard overlooking the beautiful lake.', 'Rent includes basic internet and cable.', 'Community amenities include; swimming pool, playground, walking trails with exercise stations, dog parks and 24/7 roaming security.', 'Just minutes away from Aventura mall, restaurants and beaches.', "Minutes away from I-95, I-595 & Florida's Turnpike.", 'Property has tenants until August 7th.', 'Association requires all tenants over 18 on lease have a minimum 650 credit score.', 'THIS IS A YEARLY LEASE.', 'Landlord requires First Month, Last Month and Security Deposit to move in (3 month’s rent).', ' Acceptable credit score/report for all persons on the lease (650+), background check and PROOF of income showing sustained combined incomes at least 3 times the amount of the monthly rent.', 'Must have no judgments or money owed to previous landlords.', 'Dianne Warren,', 'show contact info', ', Beachfront Realty.', ' Map view is approximate, not exact, for security reasons.', 'Please CALL to view this property.', ' No texts or emails for first contact.', ' Private owner property.']
